minecraft:can_destroy_in_creative.description: Prevent destruction of blocks in creative mode while holding this item.

minecraft:ignores_permission.description: Ignores player permissions when holding the item.

minecraft:mining_speed.description: Set the mining speed of an item.

minecraft:damage.description: Set the damage an item deals.

minecraft:dye_powder.description: Set that this item is a dye and its dye color.

minecraft:explodable.description: Whether the item entity survives an explosion.

minecraft:liquid_clipped.description: Whether the item rendering clips liquids.

minecraft:allow_off_hand.description: Whether the item can be placed inside of the off hand.

minecraft:projectile.description: Sets the projectile used by minecraft:shooter and minecraft:throwable.

projectile_entity.description: The entity to use as the projectile for this item when it is used as ammunition.

minecraft:block_placer.description: Planter item component. planter items are items that can be planted.

block.description: Set the placement block name for the planter item.

use_on.description: List of block descriptors that contain blocks that this item can be used on. If left empty, all blocks will be allowed.

minecraft:entity_placer.description: Allow this item to place entities

entity.description: The entity to be placed in the world.

use_on.description: List of block descriptors that contain blocks that this item can be used on. If left empty, all blocks will be allowed.

dispense_on.description: List of block descriptors that contain blocks that this item can be dispensed on. If left empty, all blocks will be allowed.

minecraft:knockback_resistance.description: For items that provide knockback resistance.

max_draw_duration.description: Draw Duration. Default is set to 0.

charge_on_draw.description: Charge on draw? Default is set to false.

scale_power_by_draw_duration.description: Scale power by draw duration? Default is set to false.

launch_power_scale.description: Launch power scale. Default is set to 1.0.

max_launch_power.description: Launch power. Default is set to 1.0.

ammunition.description: Define the ammunition item to use.

use_offhand.description: Whether ammunition can be taken from the offhand.

search_inventory.description: Whether the whole inventory should be searched for the ammunition.

use_in_creative.description: Whether this ammunition can be used in creative mode.

max_durability.description: Max durability is the amount of damage that this item can take before breaking.

minecraft:weapon.description: Weapon Item Component. Added to every weapon item such as axe, sword, trident, bow, crossbow.

on_hit_block.description: Trigger for letting you know when this item is used to hit a block.

on_hurt_entity.description: Trigger for letting you know when this item is used to hurt another mob.

on_not_hurt_entity.description: Trigger for letting you know when this item hit another actor, but didn't do damage.

minecraft:record.description: Allows the item to be put in a jukebox and play music.

sound_event.description: A string value correseponding to a sound event in the game code.

duration.description: A float value that determines how long particles are spawned from the JukeBox Block, should approximately match length of sound event.

comparator_signal.description: An integer value that represents the strength of the analog signal, used by the Comparator Block.

minecraft:repairable.description: Repairable item component: how much damage can this item repair, what items can repair it.

on_repaired.description: Event that is called when this item has been repaired.

minecraft:cooldown.description: Cool down time for a component. After you use an item it becomes unusable for the duration specified by the 'cool down time' setting in this component.

category.description: The type of cool down for this item.

duration.description: The duration of time this item will spend cooling down before becoming usable again.

minecraft:on_use_on.description: The on_use_on item component allows you to receive an event when the item is used on a block in the world.

on_use_on.description: Event trigger for when the item is used.

minecraft:on_use.description: The on_use item component allows you to receive an event when the item is used.

on_use.description: Event trigger for when the item is used.

minecraft:digger.description: Digger item. Component put on items that dig.

use_efficiency.description: Use efficiency? Default is set to false.

block.description: Blocks/block tags that are broken at the set speed.

on_dig.description: Trigger for when you dig a block that isn't listed in destroy_speeds.

minecraft:fertilizer.description: Allows the item to speed the growth of crops like bone meal.

minecraft:fuel.description: Fuel component. Allows this item to be used as fuel in a furnace to 'cook' other items.

duration.description: How long in seconds will this fuel cook items for.

minecraft:throwable.description: Throwable item component. Throwable items, such as a snowball.

do_swing_animation.description: Whether the item should use the swing animation when thrown. Default is set to false.

max_draw_duration.description: The maximum duration to draw a throwable item. Default is set to 0.0.

min_draw_duration.description: The minimum duration to draw a throwable item. Default is set to 0.0.

scale_power_by_draw_duration.description: Whether or not the power of the throw increases with duration charged. Default is set to false.

launch_power_scale.description: The scale at which the power of the throw increases. Default is set to 1.0.

max_launch_power.description: The maximum power to launch the throwable item. Default is set to 1.0.

minecraft:potion.description: Defines the item as a potion.

minecraft:creative_category.description: The category for the item to be in the creative menu.

minecraft:icon.description: The icon item componenent determines the icon to represent the item in the UI and elsewhere.

texture.description: The key from the RP/textures/item_texture.json 'texture_data' object associated with the texture file Example: blaze_powder.

frame.description: An index or expression for which frame of the icon to display. Default resolves to 0.

minecraft:use_animation.description: The animation to use when this item is being used, e.g when the item is being eaten.

minecraft:render_offsets.description: The offset of the item rendered in an entity's hand.

minecraft:hover_text_color.description: The color of the item's name.

on_consume.description: Event to fire once the item has been consumed.

effects.deprecationMessage: Deprecated in favor of event responses (format_version: v1.16.100).

remove_effects.deprecationMessage: Deprecated in favor of event responses (format_version: v1.16.100).

on_use_action.deprecationMessage: Deprecated in favor of event responses (format_version: v1.16.100).

on_use_range.deprecationMessage: Deprecated in favor of event responses (format_version: v1.16.100).

minecraft:display_name.description: Display name item component. Display names display the name of an item.

value.description: Set the display name for an item.
